interface.name: zeroinstall-plugin-manager
interface.summary: user-specific plugin manager for zero-install applications
interface.description:
This program is intended to be used as a <runner> for another zero install feed, e.g:
<command name="run"> <runner interface=""> <arg>http://example.com/your-feed.xml</arg> </runner> </command> <command name="core" path="my-program-executable"/>
It manages a user-specific list of feed URIs ("plugins"), and launches the desired URL with those URIs as additional dependencies.
For command-line options, run with --plugin-help
